SummaryEnglish: A 16-year-old boy, Marcus Daimon, an undefeated street fighter, meets Agumon, who has escaped from the Digital Accident Tactics Squad (DATS), a secret government organization set up to defend the human world from invading wild Digimon. After fighting each other, the two quickly become friends, and through a series of events, are inducted into DATS, where they hope to grow in strength.
SummaryJapanese:
三度の飯よりケンカが好きな少年・大門大（だいもんまさる）。ある日もケンカに明け暮れていた大の前に、恐竜のような姿をした奇妙な生物が現れる。その奇妙な生物「アグモン」は異世界「デジタルワールド」からやってきた「デジタルモンスター」だった。大とアグモンはケンカを通じて意気投合する。ところが、アグモンはデジモン事件の捜査組織「DATS（ダット）」から追われているはぐれデジモンだった。
　大からアグモンを取り戻そうとするDATS。追われる大とアグモンの前に、成熟期デジモン・コカトリモンが現れる。その巨大な姿に闘争心をかきたてられた大は、コカトリモンに戦いを挑む。コカトリモンに一撃を加えた大の拳に「デジソウル」が宿る。大のデジソウルを受け取ったアグモンはジオグレイモンに進化し、コカトリモンを倒すのだった。その様子を見たDATSの司令官・薩摩は大とアグモンをDATSに正式にスカウトする。かくして、ケンカ番長・大門大はアグモンを率いて人間界を脅かすデジモンの脅威に立ち向かうことになるのだった。

1.TitleEnglish: Digimon Savers 3D: The Digital World in Imminent Danger!
1.SummaryEnglish: A seven minute CGI short. The Digimon travel through the digital word and discover a Digimon eating away its data and decide to stop him.
1.TitleJapanese: デジモンセイバーズ3D デジタルワールド危機イッパツ！
1.SummaryJapanese:
人気デジモンのアグモン、ガオモン、 ララモンといっしょにデジタルワールド 探検ツアーに出かけよう！
突然起こる ハプニング、次々と現れるデジモンたち… 無事に現実世界(リアルワールド)に 戻って来られるかな?

2.TitleEnglish: Digimon Savers: Ultimate Power! Activate Burst Mode!!
2.SummaryEnglish: The plot revolves around Agumon, Gaomon and Lalamon, whose partners are put into an eternal sleep, along with the rest of the humans, because of a mysterious thorn that spread throughout the city. After saving Rhythm, a Digimon in the form of a young girl, they learn from her that the thorns are the work of an Ultimate Digimon, named Argomon, and the four set out for his castle to confront him.
2.TitleJapanese: デジモンセイバーズ THE MOVIE 究極パワー！バーストモード発動！！

3.TitleEnglish: Digimon Savers Special: Agumon! Gaomon! Lalamon! Explosion! The Last Battle Off-screen
3.SummaryEnglish: Special compilation included in the final volume of DVDs from the Digimon Savers series, containing commentary from Agumon, Gaomon, and Lalamon
3.TitleJapanese: デジモンセイバーズ映像特典 - アグモン！ガオモン！ララモン！爆裂！場外ラストバトル！

1.SummaryEnglish: Fourteen-year-old street fighter Marcus meets a strange dinosaur-like creature. This strange creature, "Agumon", is a "Digital Monster" from the "Digital World".
1.TitleJapanese: 俺が大だ！コカトリモン襲来

2.SummaryEnglish: Marcus tries to hide Agumon from DATS in his house, but DATS quickly concludes that he is there, so they send Yoshi to investigate.
2.TitleJapanese: 燃えろ怒りのデジソウル 闇にひそむフライモン

3.SummaryEnglish: A new member of DATS appears from Austria: Thomas H. Norstein, a fourteen-year-old genius who looks down on Marcus. Because of their different behavior, the two start to fight over everything.
3.TitleJapanese: 帰ってきた天才トーマ！メラモンをぶっとばせ

4.TitleEnglish: The New Team of Marcus and Thomas!
4.SummaryEnglish: Marcus and Thomas are ordered to work together, but they aren't able to do so, which becomes clear during the pursuit of a group of Numemon. Suddenly a Drimogemon appears and helps two burglars steal money.
4.TitleJapanese: 新チーム初出動！ドリモゲモンを追え!

5.SummaryEnglish: Marcus and Thomas, together with their Digimon partners, enter the Digital World to capture Drimogemon.
5.TitleJapanese: デジタルワールド突入！ドリモゲモンの罠

6.SummaryEnglish: Although Agumon and Marcus work well together to defeat a Tortomon, Agumon gets angry at Marcus after a comment of his and now hides in his Digivice.
6.TitleJapanese: 大・アグモンコンビ解消！？疾風ガルルモン

7.TitleEnglish: A Birthday Kristy Will Never Forget!
7.SummaryEnglish: It's Kristy's birthday and Marcus must attend supplementary exams to save his grades. Unable to be by his sister's side on this day, he asks Thomas to take his place. A Citramon, however, threatens to ruin everything.
7.TitleJapanese: トーマの休日 爆裂ボンバーナニモン

8.SummaryEnglish: Yoshi is dating a famous musician, Neon Hanamura, who is also her childhood friend.
8.TitleJapanese: ヨシノ玉の輿ゲット!? クリサリモンの影

9.SummaryEnglish: A famous boxer has a fantastic comeback after being absent for some years because of an injury. Thomas is a great fan of his, and when rumors of him using a Digimon to help him in his fights start to spread, he investigates, determined to prove his innocence.
9.TitleJapanese: トーマ栄光なき戦い 暗躍トゲモン

10.SummaryEnglish: Thomas invites Kristy, Marcus, and Agumon to his mansion for lunch. Marcus becomes the unfortunate victim of strange unexplained accidents.
10.TitleJapanese: マサル人生最悪の日 いたずらソウルモン

11.SummaryEnglish: The owner of a store that specializes in baking white buns suddenly becomes addicted to gambling. For unknown reasons, he has consecutive winning streaks in every bet, all thanks to the prayers he has paid to a mysterious shrine.
11.TitleJapanese: 親子の絆を取り戻せ イビルモンの幻惑

12.TitleEnglish: The Digi-egg That Fell to Earth
12.SummaryEnglish: Kristy's made a new friend, a Digimon called Biyomon. Although Marcus feels optimistic for his sister and consents to let Biyomon stay, he's later told that people can't keep a Digimon they've made a relationship with if they aren't DATS members!
12.TitleJapanese: 知香はボクが守る! ピヨモンの決意

13.SummaryEnglish: Merukimon appears in the real world to prevent Falcomon from being defeated, defeating easily the DATS Digimon and reverting Biyomon to a Digi-egg in the process. In a desperate attempt to find his way back to Kristy after Merukimon revives him, Biyomon loses control and quickly evolves to Aquilamon and then into Garudamon, wreaking chaos over the city.
13.TitleJapanese: マサル新たなる力 進化! ライズグレイモン

14.TitleEnglish: The Wild Boy of the Digital World
14.SummaryEnglish: To stop Merukimon's further assaults on the human world, DATS authorizes Yoshi, Thomas, and Marcus to be dispatched into the Digital World.
14.TitleJapanese: デジモン少年イクト 森の番人ジュレイモン

15.SummaryEnglish: As they wander further into the Digital World, the DATS stumble upon a ghost city which is home to a nest of Dokugumon. Without warning, the spider Digimon quickly trap the DATS and their partner Digimon, dragging them all into the depths below where their lord MetalPhantomon dwells.
15.TitleJapanese: 母さんの想い出 吠えろマッハガオガモン

16.SummaryEnglish: Yoshi's struck by a contagious virus which seemingly affects humans, though Digimon remain immune to its effects. With Marcus and Thomas gone for supplies and Lalamon alone nursing Yoshi, Keenan and Falcomon take advantage of the opportunity to get rid of the crippled Saver, only for the boy to become infected as well.
16.TitleJapanese: 仲間はファルコモン!? モーレツ! ブロッサモン

17.TitleEnglish: Yoshi's Biggest Battle: The One With Herself
17.SummaryEnglish: Yoshi has lost her battle confidence, feeling like she's always dragging down her companions. The group is caught up in an avalanche caused by Mammothmon, and Yoshi, Thomas, and Lalamon fall down to the bottom of a valley.
17.TitleJapanese: 奇跡を呼ぶ歌声 ライラモン進化

18.SummaryEnglish: After overcoming difficult hardships along their trek, the DATS finally arrive at Infinity Ice Ridge. To their surprise, the old man, Homer Yushima, is waiting for them near the entrance, leading them to a cave shortcut.
18.TitleJapanese: DATSチーム全滅!? 激突メルクリモン

19.SummaryEnglish: With Yushima's help, Marcus, Keenan, and the others are able to return to the real world. However, they are forced to leave Yushima behind in the Digital World.
19.TitleJapanese: 標的はイクト!? ゴツモンの企み

20.SummaryEnglish: The DATS arrive at Dr. Crier's home, but Keenan runs away in shock and denial at the sight of his human mother.
20.TitleJapanese: 母親を救え、イクト　ハグルモンの檻

21.TitleEnglish: The Digimon Army Makes Its Move
21.SummaryEnglish: Enraged that Merukimon has not taken proactive action to deal with the human problem, SaberLeomon dispatches a Digimon armada consisting of hundreds of Pteramon and Boarmon, led by Gotsumon, to the human world to destroy it.
21.TitleJapanese: 人間界大パニック デジモン軍団進撃

22.SummaryEnglish: The Digimon invasion was temporarily halted due to the efforts of a single man, who Sampson knows and who gained the approval of Chief Hashiba. Understanding that Keenan has no place to go, Marcus invites him and Falcomon to stay at his home.
22.TitleJapanese: 倒せ究極体! 怒涛サーベルレオモン

23.SummaryEnglish: Due to the widespread destruction that the Digimon caused in the city, DATS, acting on orders from the government ministry, dispatches the DATS, along with a troop unit, into the Digital World to defeat Merukimon once and for all.
23.TitleJapanese: 再びデジタルワールドへ インセキモン大暴れ

24.TitleJapanese: 明かされる過去 非情！ギズモン:ＡＴ

25.TitleJapanese: 倉田の野望をくだけ 飛翔ヤタガラモン

26.TitleEnglish: Memory is the First Thing to Go
26.TitleJapanese: マサル記憶消去 失われた絆

27.TitleJapanese: 倉田を追え・デジモン纎滅作戦開始！

28.SummaryEnglish: The gang appears in the Digital World and head towards Cherrymon's forest for an information gathering.
28.TitleJapanese: 進化不可能！デジヴァイス崩壊

29.TitleEnglish: How to Fix a Broken Digivice
29.SummaryEnglish: After their Digivice iC broke, Marcus, Thomas, and Yoshi stumble onto a gym where BanchoLeomon trains them. Can they master their ultimate DNA Charge?
29.TitleJapanese: よみがえるデジヴァイス 新たなる輝き

30.TitleJapanese: とらわれの大(マサル) 聖なる都の罠

31.TitleEnglish: Showdown Between Geniuses: Thomas vs. Nanami!
31.SummaryEnglish: Both the DATS and the inhabitants of the Holy Capital are preparing for the impending battle. When news arrive that Kurata's camp has been discovered, Marcus takes the initiative to strike a head on assault, but Thomas disagrees since it may be a trap. However, Thomas feels underappreciated witnessing how all the Digimon support Marcus.
31.TitleJapanese: 天才対決! トーマvsナナミ

32.TitleJapanese: 猛攻倉田軍団 聖なる都を守れ

33.TitleJapanese: 最後の決戦！聖、究極進化

34.TitleJapanese: 訣別の日 最強の敵・トーマ!

35.TitleJapanese: 破滅のパワー シャイングレイモン暴走

36.SummaryEnglish: Kurata unleashes Belphemon on the city, causing Yoshi, Keenan, Miki, and Megumi to confront him.
36.TitleJapanese: 魔王ベルフェモン復活

37.TitleJapanese: 目覚めよアグモン ベルフェモンを倒せ!

38.TitleEnglish: The Power of the Burst Mode
38.TitleJapanese: バーストモード 究極を超える力

39.SummaryEnglish: Craniummon is briefed by Yggdrasil about all the events that occurred up to now while Marcus and the others protect the citizens from the onslaught of lightning from the Digital World.
39.TitleJapanese: 人間界消滅！イグドラシルの決断

40.TitleJapanese: 最強騎士団・ロイヤルナイツ集結

41.TitleJapanese: 拳でたしかめろ！父さんの想い

42.SummaryEnglish: In order to learn Spencer's true intentions, Marcus and ShineGreymon head once again to the Digital World. However, Thomas and the others stay in the human world to fend off the Royal Knights' ongoing attack with Crusadermon this time directing the assault.
42.TitleJapanese: トーマ決意のバーストモード

43.TitleJapanese: 力こそ正義！獣騎士ドゥフトモン

44.SummaryEnglish: The DATS team climb Yggdrasil's headquarters, confronting odd crystals that repel their attacks. Leaving the others behind, Marcus, Agumon, and Gotsumon confront Yggdrasil. Meanwhile, Craniummon heads to the real world and confronts Garudamon.
44.TitleJapanese: 砕け！クレニアムモンの最強の盾

45.TitleJapanese: 男と男のタイマン勝負！大(マサル)VS英(スグル)

46.TitleJapanese: 衝撃！バンチョーレオモンの真実

47.TitleJapanese: 未来を守れ！DATS最後の戦い

48.TitleJapanese: 完全決着！さらばケンカ番長
